effects: You can expend one use of Channel Divinity to conjure spectral vines.
Creatures of your choice you can see within 15 feet must make a Strength save or be Restrained for 1 minute.
A restrained creature repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.
You always have the spells in the Oath of the Ancients Spells table prepared at the paladin levels shown.
You and your allies have resistance to necrotic, psychic, and radiant damage while in your Aura of Protection.

feature_defs.trigger: when you are reduced to 0 hit points and not killed outright
effects: You instead drop to 1 hit point and regain hit points equal to three times your paladin level.
You can’t be aged magically, and you cease visibly aging.
limits: Once you use this feature, you can’t do so again until you finish a long rest.

effects: You imbue your Aura of Protection with primal power for 1 minute (or until you end it).
Diminish Defiance: enemies in the aura have disadvantage on saving throws against your spells and Channel Divinity options.
Regeneration: at the start of each of your turns, you regain 10 hit points.
Swift Spells: when you cast a spell with a casting time of 1 action, you can cast it using a bonus action instead.
limits: Once you use this feature, you can’t use it again until you finish a long rest.
You can restore your use of this feature by expending a level 5 spell slot (no action required).
